Root permission is needed to carry out build prop demo!! Current value = %1$s Build Prop Simulator blah ..... Restarting app for the options to get the new build prop property value Panel Header Bg Select Image using.. Error processing image An error ocurred while running the associated script Apply Backup Restore Restoring and synchronizing %1$s preferences and files.... You can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the right you can delete the item To change the color click on the item you want to modify.\r\nYou can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the left will allow you to copy the current color to the clipboard. Swipping it to the right allows you to delete the item. You can quick delete a selection in the main screen by swipping it left in the list and the option to delete the item will appear.\nnTo place an item in other position just long press it and drag it to the desired position.nTo add or delete elements use the + / - button.\nIf you want to delete all your current selection just press the X button. You can quick delete a selection in the main screen by swipping it left in the list and the option to delete the item will appear.\nClick on the element to edit it.\nClick on + - button to add elements. \nIf you want to delete all your current selection just press the X button.\nYou can sort the list dragging the elements.\nIf you select an existing app it will be updated Help Application help Back Select Application Creaing and sorting list .. Creating applications list... ( %1$s is not installed! ) Delete values Reset values Delete selected values. Are you sure? Reset to default values. Are you sure? %1$d apps selected> %1$d items selected> (%1$d selected)> Error sending broadcast: %1$s Not installed! %1$d items selected! items selected. %1$s is already selected!! App not sected / not installed!! Delete List It allows to delete all the values. List Ordering Sorts the list of applications alphabetically App not installed This icon indicates that the application is not installed or some kind of error happend. Value copied to the clipboard Max number of allowed items has been reached. ( max = %1$d ) Long press on items to sort them Activities Actions User Applications ShortCuts Some problem ocurred while creating the shortcut!! Error starting the activity. Some type of access/activities/shortcuts just can be executed from system applications. In other cases, it is not possiblie to launch them! Ok Cancel Divider height in lists FAB Button position Force Opposite Position Show Button (FAB) Show Group Buttons Floating Action Button (FAB) Style and Theming Navigation Drawer Other Options Rom and App Help Floating Recents Screens Area Enable Recents Floating Window (long press on FAB) Hide with Back Key Hide touching outside (it is always hiden with back key) Remember Screen Open Options Groups Exit confirmation Finish Exit. Are you sure? Select color Lightness Alpha Auto Color Selection Suggested Colors Preferences Backup Select the new backup name. Do not use extension No valid backup name Backup was ok! Backup already exist Bakcup %1$s already exists. Do you want to overwrite it? Backups dir not found Unknown error while restoring.. Backup Restoration Select the backup to be restored Are you sure you want to restore the backup %1$s ? The backup %1$s was successfully restored. %2$d preferences were found Click: select item color. Double click: Reset item color to its default value. Long click: copy the current item color to the clipboard. You can use it on other item or color preference Color Picker Press to apply Color Pickers Style Circle Flower Square Reboot device? This preference requires the phone to be rebooted to take effect.\nDo you want to reboot your device now? Reboot could not be done. Make sure either your app is inside the privileged folder or your phone is rooted. For now, reboot manually the phone for the changes to take effect. Problem trying rebooting!!! Restart %1$s ? For the change to take effect, this preference needs the following app to be restarted: %1$s\nPress OK to make it now or later manually reboot your phone No root permission!! This action requires root permission for this application!! Authorize this action Are you sure you want to run this action? Are you sure you want to run this scrip: %1$s ? Update Item Rom Info App. Pulse Speed (Time On - Time Off) No App Selected It was not possible to screen off to test. Please screen off manually to check the led settings.
A problem ocurred while saving the value in settings. Try installing the app in priv-app Drag and drop the elements to short out the list Select Option

Most of the preferences can be reset to their default values by double clicking.
Please, read the help buttons which appear in some preferences. That help will tell you how to delete, sort, or whatever is enabled by the dev.
You can select you default color picker style. This style is only taken if the dev has not defined an specific style for the color preferences or if you are in a preference using a specific style
In color picker preferences you can copy the hex value to the clipboard by long-clicking on the color circle. This feature can be usefull when there are many color pickers preferences
Floating Recents Area\n\n - You can enable or disable in this menu. Floating Action Button has to be enabled. Then long-click on it to show the floating area\n - You can change the transparency of the area by double - clicking on the title area\n - You can move the area through the screen by long pressing the title area\n - When the keyboard is needed the floating area is hiden.\n
Some options supported by this app have to be enabled by your rom dev:\n\n - Background image for the Navigation Panel Header\n - Selectable themes\n
